learning_objectives.description: Draw and use the graphs of y = a sin bx + c, y = a cos bx + c, y = a tan bx + c where a is a positive integer, b is a simple fraction or integer, and c is an integer. (Graphs will be drawn over a given domain which may be in either degrees or radians. For a graph of y = a tan bx + c, the x-coordinate of any asymptote should be clearly labelled. Fractions will have a denominator of 2, 3, 4, 6 or 8 only.)
